availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio, soldier. Ohio native. Served as a captain and commissary of subsistence of volunteers in the United States Army's Commissary Department from October 31, 1861 to August 31, 1865. Brevetted to major of volunteers to date from July 14, 1865.

ab.bibl:
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Application #1012271.
Heitman, Francis B.,Historical Register and Dictionary of the United States Army, from its Organization, September 29, 1789, to March 2, 1903, p. 672.
